com.here.android.mpa.search

Class CategoryFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.search.CategoryFilter

  • public class CategoryFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a filter used when performing a search for popular places within a specific geographic area. (This type of search is otherwise known as "explore".) The filter limits search results to the specified categories.

    A filter can include one or more of:

    • A Category
    • A Category.Global
    • A String indicating a known category
    See Also:
    Category, Category.Global
